trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um adaptador de página para o conjunto de adaptador XHTML.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: The XhtmlPageAdapter class inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe XhtmlPageAdapter herda a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter>classe e implementa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of any additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de todos os cabeçalhos HTTP adicionais que o cache é variado.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> class inherits the CacheVaryByHeaders property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> interface and always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>classe herda a propriedade de CacheVaryByHeaders do <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter>interface e sempre retorna `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> object of additional HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IList>objeto de cabeçalhos HTTP adicionais.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current cookieless <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session*> property data, if any.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o atual cookieless <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session*>dados de propriedade, se houver.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: The CookielessDataDictionary property is populated when a valid <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface is configured as an attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlsSection> element.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CookielessDataDictionary é populada quando válido <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>interface está configurada como um atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlsSection>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlsSection> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing key/value pairs for the current cookieless <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*> data, if any; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém pares chave/valor atual cookieless <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>dados, se existirem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer that is appropriate for the target device.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um gravador de texto que é apropriado para o dispositivo de destino.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object or an object inherited from the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>objeto ou um objeto herdado de <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter"></xref> object based on the provided <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto baseado em fornecidos <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>objeto.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Returns the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de dados de postagem.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: Because some devices handle postback differently from others, the DeterminePostBackMode method allows the adapter to modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alguns dispositivos manipular postback de forma diferente, o método DeterminePostBackMode permite que o adaptador modificar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> objeto que contém informações de solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de argumento do evento.

trans-unit.source: The collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de dados de postagem do objeto de solicitação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> object containing all query string or form parameters and values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> do objeto que contém todos os parâmetros de cadeia de caracteres ou formulário e valores de consulta.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a configuração de dispositivo do adaptador aplica-se à solicitação especificada.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType*> for the browser is one of these members of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref> object: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType*>para o navegador é um desses membros do <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref> objeto: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.Doctype"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key for submitting the event argument.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave para enviar o argumento do evento.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: If an inheriting adapter overrides the EventArgumentKey property, it must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A> method to process the postback.
trans-unit.target: Se um adaptador de herança substitui a propriedade EventArgumentKey, também deverá substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>método para processar o postback.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a chave.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key for submitting the event source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave para enviar a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: If an inheriting adapter overrides the EventSourceKey property, it must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A> method to process the postback.
trans-unit.target: Se um adaptador de herança substitui a propriedade EventSourceKey, também deverá substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>método para processar o postback.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter.DeterminePostBackMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a chave.

trans-unit.source: Called if an unhandled error occurs on the page.
trans-unit.target: Chamado se ocorrer um erro sem tratamento na página.

trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: An adapter can choose to handle the error and display an error message.
trans-unit.target: Um adaptador pode optar por tratar o erro e exibir uma mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> class does nothing and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>classe não faz nada e retorna `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>objeto.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The HandlePagePostBackEvent method is called during postback.
trans-unit.target: O método HandlePagePostBackEvent é chamado durante um postback.

trans-unit.source: An adapter can choose to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Um adaptador pode optar por tratar o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> class does not handle the postback event and always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>classe não manipula o evento de postback e sempre retorna `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event.
trans-unit.target: O nome do evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: The InitWriterState method is called before rendering the page.
trans-unit.target: O método InitWriterState é chamado antes do processamento da página.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the following properties on `writer` for the target device: - <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A>
trans-unit.target: Este método define as propriedades a seguir em `writer` para o dispositivo de destino:- <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Sets conditional pagination for the page.
trans-unit.target: Define a paginação condicional para a página.

trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A> property for the page.
trans-unit.target: As verificações de método OnPreRender o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A>chamou.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.ActiveForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.Action%2A> property is not empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> property for the active form is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.Action%2A>propriedade não estiver vazia, o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A>propriedade para o formulário ativo está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> method before exiting.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPreRender chama a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>método antes de sair.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Form%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel?displayProperty=fullName> class, which provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Form%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel?displayProperty=fullName>classe, que fornece o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel.Paginate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Form%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> object for the OnPreRender method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto para o método OnPreRender.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_CookielessDataDictionaryType" name="CookielessDataDictionaryType" href=""></xref> in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MobileControls" name="MobileControls" href=""></xref> configuration section of the Web.config file is set to a valid dictionary type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref uid="langword_csharp_CookielessDataDictionaryType" name="CookielessDataDictionaryType" href=""> </xref> no <xref uid="langword_csharp_MobileControls" name="MobileControls" href=""> </xref> seção de configuração do arquivo Web. config é definida como um tipo de dicionário válido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the page content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref>, which renders the content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Envia o conteúdo da página a um fornecido <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>, que renderiza o conteúdo ao cliente.

trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object that writes the content to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref> objeto que grava o conteúdo no navegador cliente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a link on the current page to enable postback on devices that do not support postback events.
trans-unit.target: Cria um link na página atual para habilitar o postback em dispositivos que não oferecem suporte a eventos de postback.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: Some devices are able to execute a postback event on a link or button only.
trans-unit.target: Alguns dispositivos sejam capazes de executar um evento de postagem em um link ou botão somente.

trans-unit.source: The RenderUrlPostBackEvent method writes a link with a URL that contains all of the information that is required to process the form and to update and display the page.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderUrlPostBackEvent grava um link com uma URL que contém todas as informações necessárias para processar o formulário e para atualizar e exibir a página.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object that writes the link.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref> objeto que grava o link.

trans-unit.source: The target URL for postback.
trans-unit.target: A URL de destino de postback.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event for which the link is substituting.
trans-unit.target: O nome do evento para o qual o link está substituindo.
